name: Entropy (itch) (lilyate)
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 game about "Home". For us, home is where you are not alone. 

Entropy is an atmospheric and exploratory art-game in wich you have to collect the missing parts of your being and regain a state of homeness.

Gravitate the missing towards you, then visit the center of the galaxy to re-ensemble.

//

Entropy es un juego-arte exploratorio y atmosférico, en el que debes recolectar las partes faltantes de tu ser, y recuperar tu hogar.

Atrae gravitacionalmente a los cubos faltantes y luego visita el centro de la galaxia para recuperar tu forma original.

//

Controls:

Arrow keys / Flechas  - Move / Moverse

Space bar / Barra de espacio  - Attract / Atraer

//

Game design & Concept: Branko Milic, Lucas López

Visual design: Francisca Miles

3D Art: Nicolás Velásquez

Code & Engineering: Cristóbal Velásquez

Sound design & Music: Lucas López
